data.event: Founded in 1873, the city's economy is largely based on tourism related to its title as the "Folk Music Capitol of the World".

event.title: hosts the Ozark Folk Festival in April

data.event: Mountain View hosts the Ozark Folk Festival in April, various folk artists at Ozark Folk Center State Park throughout the year, and weekly music gatherings on the courthouse steps that are free and open to the public.
Prior to the founding of Mountain View in 1890, the town of Riggsville existed immediately to the east.
Mountain View was incorporated on August 14, 1890.
